contents: 我的意思是在劝进之下本可以像所有共产主义国家一样打着民主的旗号干着专治的事情却主动拒绝。本来我想引用乔治华盛顿维基里的一段的，后来一看英文版的维基里没有，而是说At the end of his second term, Washington retired for personal and political reasons, dismayed with personal attacks, and to ensure that a truly contested presidential election could be held. He did not feel bound to a two-term limit, but his retirement set a significant precedent. Washington is often credited with setting the principle of a two-term presidency, but it was Thomas Jefferson who first refused to run for a third term on political grounds. 所以才变成了这么一句不伦不类的话
